title: Lavender Aromatherapy: Ready for Prime-Time Office Use?
author: Dennis J Baumgardner
description: The editor-in-chief of Journal of Patient-Centered Research and Reviews comments on the perioperative use of lavender aromatherapy and its potential to relieve pain and anxiety during minor primary care office procedures.
